title: Maguy Le Coze, Co-Founder of Le Bernardin
teaser: Host Jessica Harris speaks with Maguy Le Coze, co-founder of the restaurant Le Bernardin. Harris also speaks with Dan Yates, co-founder of Opower, a software company focused on energy efficiency.
contentencoded:
Host Jessica Harris speaks with Maguy Le Coze, co-founder of the restaurant Le Bernardin. Harris also speaks with Dan Yates, co-founder of Opower, a software company focused on energy efficiency.
